snippet: Ben Revere, a 24-year-old outfielder, is expected to fill the center-field hole left by the trade of the two-time All-Star Shane Victorino in July.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Philadelphia Phillies acquire center fielder Ben Revere from Minnesota Twins for pitchers Vance Worley and Trevor May; other baseball developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Ben Revere, a 24-year-old outfielder, is expected to fill the center-field hole left by the trade of the two-time All-Star Shane Victorino in July.

headline.seo: Phillies Trade Two Pitchers for Ben Revere
headline.main: Phillies Trade Two Pitchers for Outfielder
headline.print_headline: Phillies Trade Two Pitchers to Fill Outfield Need
